mapper.select: select * from(select placename, latitude, longitude, category, count(*) as count from plan_dt group by placename, latitude, longitude, category order by count(*) desc) where ${value1} = #{value2} and rownum <=5

select to_char(userjoindate, ${value1}) as userdate,count(*) as count from userinfo where to_char(userjoindate, #{value2}) between #{value3} and #{value4} group by to_char(userjoindate, ${value1}) order by to_char(userjoindate, ${value1}) asc
select usergender, count(*) as count from userinfo group by usergender order by count(*) desc

SELECT agegroup, count(agegroup) as count FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN userage < 20 THEN '19세미만' WHEN userage > 19 AND userage < 30 THEN '20 ~ 29세' WHEN userage > 29 AND userage < 40 THEN '30 ~ 39세' WHEN userage > 39 AND userage < 50 THEN '40 ~ 49세' WHEN userage > 49 AND userage < 60 THEN '50 ~ 59세' WHEN userage > 59 THEN '60세이상' END as agegroup FROM userinfo ) GROUP BY agegroup ORDER BY agegroup
